column1: sentences
The cat sat on the windowsill.
She walked home after the rain.
The child dropped his ice cream.
They waited for the bus in silence.
He opened the door slowly.
The teacher wrote the lesson on the board.
The dog barked at the passing car.
The sun set behind the mountains.
She found a letter under the table.
He forgot his keys again.
The room was filled with laughter.
They shared a meal by the fireplace.
The phone rang twice before he answered.
She closed the book and sighed.
The wind shook the old tree.
He cleaned the kitchen after dinner.
The girl smiled at her reflection.
They drove past the empty fields.
The water in the lake was freezing.
He bought flowers for his mother.
She discovered a new hobby.
The movie made everyone cry.
The clouds covered the whole sky.
He tripped over a loose stone.
She packed her suitcase quickly.
The baby reached for the toy.
He fixed the broken lamp.
The car stopped at the red light.
She whispered a secret to her friend.
They built a small sandcastle.
The snow melted in the sunlight.
He drank a cup of warm tea.
She looked for her missing glove.
The streetlights flickered at night.
He tied his shoes tightly.
The bike fell over in the wind.
She sang a quiet song.
They planned a surprise party.
The fire crackled softly.
He picked up the scattered papers.
She reached the end of the trail.
The bird landed on a branch.
He closed the window to block the noise.
The bakery smelled of fresh bread.
She drew a picture of a tree.
They searched for the lost cat.
The waves crashed against the rocks.
He wrapped the gift carefully.
She turned on the hallway light.
The car engine made a strange sound.
She brushed the dust off the shelf.
They laughed at the joke.
He folded the laundry neatly.
The coffee spilled on the counter.
She hurried to catch the train.
They listened to the quiet music.
The box was heavier than expected.
He placed the book on the table.
She locked the door behind her.
They crossed the bridge slowly.
The candle flame flickered.
He noticed a scratch on the wall.
She opened the curtains to let light in.
They took a walk around the neighborhood.
The soup boiled on the stove.
He washed his hands before eating.
She sketched a portrait of her friend.
They watched the rain from the porch.
The flowers bloomed in spring.
He dropped a coin on the ground.
She lit a small candle.
They climbed to the top of the hill.
The chair squeaked when he sat down.
She searched through the old box.
They locked the gate before leaving.
The river flowed gently.
He tasted the sour lemon.
She knitted a warm scarf.
They checked the time on their phones.
The floor was cold in the morning.
He counted the change in his pocket.
She watched the butterflies in the garden.
They turned off the lights.
The dog wagged its tail happily.
He whispered her name softly.
She placed a blanket over the couch.
They listened to the crackling fire.
The leaves rustled in the breeze.
He wiped the table with a cloth.
She stepped into the warm bath.
They arranged the chairs in a circle.
The train arrived on schedule.
He glanced at the ticking clock.
She scribbled a note on the paper.
They finished the puzzle together.
The crowd cheered loudly.
He opened the fridge to get some milk.
She saw a light in the distance.
They waited for the storm to pass.
